title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' on a currently open file in the Navigator, nothing happens. The scripted resource editor example is not replaced with the default text editor.
EB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' on a currently open file in the Navigator, a new editor should open with the default text editor, replacing the scripted resource editor example.
SR:
1. Open the software.
2. Open a new basic project.
3. Create a new file called test.xml.
4. In the Navigator, select test.xml.
5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
6. Observe the behavior.
